summary: Storage containers near the alchemy and enchanting tables in Hjerim, Windhelm.
descriptionHtml:
I like Hjerim, but I was frustrated by the complete lack of storage space near the alchemy and enchanting tables, leaving me to “store” ingredients on the floor. No more!

This mod adds:
• A satchel, on the alchemy table. (Appears when you buy the alchemy lab.)
• A barrel, next to the alchemy table. (Appears when you buy the alchemy lab.)
• A strongbox, on top of the bookshelf. (Appears with the bookshelf when you buy the alchemy lab.)
• A few alchemy skill books and recipes, on top of the alchemy table and the barrel. (Appear when you buy the alchemy lab.)
• A chest, below the weapon plaques and next to the enchanter. (Appears when you have the murderer's mess cleaned up.)
• A safe, next to the enchanter. (Appears when you buy the enchanting lab.)
• A few enchanting skill books, on top of the enchanter and the safe. (Appear when you buy the enchanting lab.)

No DLC requirements. Compatible with Hearthfire.

May be incompatible with mods that greatly modify Hjerim.

This mod has been cleaned with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/]TES5Edit[/url].

If you find any bugs or incompatibilities, please let me know in the comments!

Also available on the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=130438553]Steam Workshop[/url].

[b]-- Notes --[/b]
This mod's filename is [i]aom_hjerim-secret-room-storage.esp[/i].
author: Aaron of Minneapolis
